courses.title: Introduction to React
courses.description: Learn the basics of React, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
courses.prerequisites: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
courses.syllabus: Week 1: Introduction to React, Week 2: Components and Props, Week 3: State and Lifecycle, Week 4: Hooks and Advanced Topics

courses.title: Advanced JavaScript
courses.description: Dive deep into JavaScript with advanced concepts and patterns.
courses.syllabus: Week 1: Asynchronous JavaScript, Week 2: Closures and Scope, Week 3: Prototypes and Inheritance, Week 4: Design Patterns, Week 5: Modern JavaScript, Week 6: Final Project
